scripts.build:no_build: cd ../Full_stack_open_osa3_teht_front_puh && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item build -Recurse ../Full_Stack_open_osa3_teht
scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force build && cd ../Full_stack_open_osa3_teht_front_puh && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item build -Recurse ../Full_Stack_open_osa3_teht
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
